com.example.habittracker2017

Class viewManageHabits

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.example.habittracker2017.viewManageHabits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class viewManageHabits
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    This is All Habit's fragment, able to view a list of habits of user, create a new habit, edit habit when clicked on the habit
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    EditHabitActivity, ViewHabitAdapter, User
